English: to offer humbly (written at the end of letter from sb of lower status to higher status)

e: `如~：「`他~`每逢~`新年~`都會~`寄~`出~`賀卡~，`敬祝~`師長~`親友~`們~`佳節~`愉快~。」

English: to offer humbly (written at the end of letter from sb of lower status to higher status)
francais: cordialement (formule épistolaire de courtoisie utilisée en fin de lettre à un supérieur)
